The journey only starts with Customer Excellence, but they’re also the ones who make our users stay for the full adventure.
 



  





 At
 **Lunar** 
 we are democratizing the power of money and changing the way we all bank, pay and invest. We have grown by leaps and bounds since starting out in Aarhus in 2015 and are now considered a
 **major player** 
 in the Nordics with offices in Aarhus, Copenhagen and Stockholm as well as employees working remotely across Europe.
 



  





 As we continue to scale our impact, we are looking for a
 **Customer Excellence Agent** 
 to help ensure and maintain the high quality and level of service that we want to deliver.
 



 As our new
 **Customer Excellence Agent** 
 you will be part of our Customer Excellence team. The team currently consists of more than 100 amazing individuals working across Denmark, Sweden, and Norway — all of them focused on ensuring that our users love using Lunar — every day. To us, being Customer Obsessed is more than just a buzzword. It’s a way of working.
 



  





 We welcome all to apply to this exciting and impactful role and look forward to following up with candidates who we believe are the best potential fit based on the following criteria:
 


* You have worked with service and sales for at least 1 years
* You're fluent in Swedish and English - bonus if you speak fluent Norweigan
* You know how to provide excellent service — and take pride in doing so
* You can keep an overview in an ever-changing environment
* You thrive on feedback and understand the importance of both giving and receiving it
* You are a problem solver and love finding solutions



  





 If this is you, please read on to learn more and consider applying. We look forward to hearing from you!
 



 What will you do?
 


* Handle inquiries from our valued customers — both written and over the phone
* Use your knowledge to assess what the individual user needs — and ensure they get it
* Help improve and optimize processes and products by providing your feedback and ideas
* Help the team to reach and improve own and common goals for service level and efficiency
* Take part in building a bank with awesome and talented people



  





 Nice to know
 



 📍The job is located in Stockholm
 



 🕰 40-hour workweek
 



 🗓 Your shifts will be between 8.00-16.30 every weekday
 



  





 We’re looking forward to hearing from you!
 



 Check out Lunar’s
 **careers page** 
 for information on benefits and our interview process.
 



 Curious to know what else we’re up to? Check out our
 **LinkedIn** 
 ,
 **Instagram** 
 , and
 **blog** 
 for the latest and greatest!
 



  





**Depending on the regulations in the country you will be employed, we will ask to see or obtain information about your criminal record.**

title: Global HR Business Partner
description:
Sinch is pioneering the way the world communicates. More than 150,000 businesses — including Google, Uber, Paypal, Visa, Tinder, and many others — rely on Sinch's Customer Communications Cloud to power engaging customer experiences through mobile messaging, voice, and email.
   

  

 Whether you need to verify users or craft omnichannel campaigns, Sinch makes it easy. Our AI-infused Super Network, APIs, and applications ensure you can connect with your customers reliably and securely, at every step of their journey.
   

  

 At Sinch we "Dream Big", "Win Together", "Keep it simple", and "Make it Happen". These values are our foundation!
   

  

**The essence of the role**
 As Global HR Business Partner, you will be located in Stockholm, Sweden, and you will report to the Head of HR EMEA. You will be part of a global HR team and work closely with leaders in different countries, alongside global and country HRBPs, as well as HR specialists in our Global HR Communities of Practice.
   

  

**As Our New Gloabl HR Business Partner You Will**
* Act as a trusted strategic HR Business Partner to senior leaders across Engineering and Product.
* Provide expert HR guidance and hands-on support in areas such as organizational development, workforce planning, and talent strategy.
* Lead and support global HR initiatives and processes to align with both business goals and regional needs.
* Drive people aspects of organizational change, transformation initiatives, and business performance improvements.
* Collaborate on and influence the development of future-proof organizational structures and capabilities.
* Coach and advise leaders through complex people matters, including team effectiveness, leadership development, and organizational change.
* Support and facilitate compensation and benefits planning, ensuring alignment with global frameworks and local practices.
* Guide and ensure consistency in performance management, succession planning, and career development efforts.
* Contribute regional and functional insights to shape the global HR agenda and influence cross-company HR strategies.
* Partner with HR colleagues to harmonize HR practices and help create a unified, consistent employee experience across geographies.
* Use data and analytics to identify trends, support decision-making, and proactively address workforce issues.
* Serve as a cultural ambassador, supporting the integration of company values into everyday HR practices and leadership behavior.


**In order to be successful in this role, we believe you have:**
* More than 10 years of experience as an HR Business Partner or HR manager in a global environment.
* A wide range of HR expertise spanning various HR areas including workforce planning, organizational design and change management, job role frameworks and career planning, performance development, compensation and benefits, and overall operational excellence in HR.
* Project management capability: you possess the expertise to seamlessly define, structure, and lead various HR initiatives, applying a project-oriented approach
* You're a go-getter, someone who takes the initiative, steer your work independently and thrive in fast-paced environments and have the agility and resilience to adjust to change. You love bringing order to things .
* Your verbal and written communication skills in English are top-notch and people trust you easily at all levels, thanks to your excellent relationship-building skills
* You're highly proficient in Microsoft Office programs


 Our corporate language is English,
 **please submit your application in English** 
 .
   

  

 Submit your application no later than
 **June 4, 2025** 
 .
   

  

**Are you ready? Join us on our journey!**
**About The Recruitment Process**
*To help us place the right people in the right role, we believe in science-based and fair assessment methods. We follow a competence-based, structured interview process where your skills, experience, and attributes relevant to the role and Sinch will be assessed. As part of our recruitment process, pre-employment testing is used to help us increase our hiring success by identifying the candidates that are most likely to thrive and be successful in the role. We acknowledge that there are two parties deciding in this process and welcome you to ask any questions you may have at any stage of the process.*

title: Lead Client Partner, Retail
company_industry: Technology, Information and Internet, Software Development, and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
**About Pinterest**
 Millions of people around the world come to our platform to find creative ideas, dream about new possibilities and plan for memories that will last a lifetime. At Pinterest, we’re on a mission to bring everyone the inspiration to create a life they love, and that starts with the people behind the product.
   

  

 Discover a career where you ignite innovation for millions, transform passion into growth opportunities, celebrate each other’s unique experiences and embrace the flexibility to do your best work. Creating a career you love? It’s Possible.
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
* Build, manage, and grow strategic partnerships with large customers & agencies
* Lead across many internal functions to create partner strategy that drive meaningful business results
* Leverage data, insights, and measurement to build innovate marketing communication plans that reach partner audience targets and achieve partner ROI goals & objectives
* Be an internal advocate for partners by working with relevant teams to respond to partner needs and feedback


**What We’re Looking For**
* Solid experience in marketing/advertising/digital, with specific acumen across media, search, data and measurement
* Established industry relationships and experience working with executive level business and marketing leaders within client organizations
* Proven track record of exceeding revenue goals with large customers in the Retail industry
* Ability to translate partner value across various levels, such as executive, operational, creative, media, and analytics teams
* Strong team player and ability to succeed in a fast-paced, rapidly changing environment while maintaining high levels of operational rigor, digital acumen, and business excellence
* Fluency in English required, Fluency in Swedish or Danish desirable
* Bachelor’s degree in a relevant field or equivalent experience


**Relocation Statement:**
* This position is not eligible for relocation assistance. Visit our PinFlex page to learn more about our working model.


**In-Office Requirement Statement**
* We let the type of work you do guide the collaboration style. That means we're not always working in an office, but we continue to gather for key moments of collaboration and connection.
* This role will need to be in the office for in-person collaboration 1-2 times per week and therefore needs to be in a commutable distance from the Stockholm office.


**Our Commitment To Inclusion**
 Pinterest is an equal opportunity employer and makes employment decisions on the basis of merit. We want to have the best qualified people in every job. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, ancestry, national origin, religion or religious creed, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth, or related medical conditions), sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, gender expression, age, marital status, status as a protected veteran, physical or mental disability, medical condition, genetic information or characteristics (or those of a family member) or any other consideration made unlawful by applicable federal, state or local laws. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. If you require a medical or religious accommodation during the job application process, please complete this form for support.

title: Integrationsutvecklare - Tietoevry Tech Services (m/f/d)
description:
**You may apply to Tietoevry by selecting Apply and fill your application details to the form. You may also Apply by using LinkedIn and populate details to your application from your LinkedIn profile.**
**Integrationsutvecklare – Forest Consulting**
 Är du en driven och engagerad integrationsutvecklare som brinner för att skapa smidiga och effektiva lösningar? Vill du vara en del av ett innovativt team på Nordens största tech-företag? Då är det dig vi söker!
   

  

 Tietoevry Forest Consulting erbjuder digitala lösningar och tjänster med fokus på integration för att stödja företag inom skogsindustrin i deras digitalisering och effektivisering av affärsprocesser. Vi erbjuder ett flexibelt och inspirerande arbetsklimat där du kan växa både professionellt och personligt. Tietoevry värdesätter öppenhet, respekt och samarbete och är stolta över att driva en inkluderande arbetsmiljö.
   

  

 Vi söker en integrationsutvecklare med erfarenhet inom Azure, som kommer att spela en central roll i att utveckla och implementera integrationslösningar för våra kunder, med fokus på att maximera deras affärsresultat genom effektiva och hållbara integrationsstrategier.
   

  

**När du börjar på Tietoevry Tech Services som integrationsutvecklare kommer du att:**
* Designa och utveckla integrationslösningar.
* Arbeta nära våra kunder för att förstå deras behov och skapa skräddarsydda lösningar.
* Delta i hela utvecklingscykeln, från kravanalys till implementation och support.
* Leda integrationsprojekt med fokus på Azure-plattformen.
* Agera som en resurs och mentor för teammedlemmar inom integrationsområdet.


**Den vi söker:**
* Har minst 2+ års erfarenhet av integrationsutveckling, med fokus på Azure.
* Har djupgående kunskaper inom Azure Integration Services (t.ex. Logic Apps, Service Bus, API Management).
* Det är meriterande om du har erfarenhet av Biztalk eller liknande integrationsplattformar.
* Är lösningsorienterad och har en stark analytisk förmåga.
* Är en lagspelare med god kommunikationsförmåga, flytande i både svenska och engelska.


**Vi erbjuder:**
 Vi erbjuder dig professionell tillväxt, meningsfulla projekt, öppen kultur och en enastående balans mellan arbete och privatliv! Vi erbjuder dig en möjlighet att skapa framtiden för en snabbt växande och viktig sektor. Vi tror att vår organisationskultur är en viktig del för att du ska bli framgångsrik. Vi tillhandahåller en flexibel hybrid arbetsmodell som en del av vår kultur och vårt sätt att arbeta. Slutligen tror vi också på nyfikenhet och konstant lärande som en livsstil där du behöver skola om dig varje dag när nya möjligheter dyker upp.
   

  

**Ansökan:**
 Bifoga ditt CV eller LinkedIn-profil så kontaktar vi dig. Intervjuer kommer att hållas löpande, så vi uppmanar dig att söka redan idag. Om du har några frågor angående denna roll, vänligen kontakta anställande chef Marcus Richt, marcus.richt@tietoevry.com.
   

  

 Hoppas vi hörs snart!
   

  

*Vi utför bakgrundskontroller av alla slutkandidater.*
*Tietoevry tackar nej till samtal från rekryteringsföretag.*
**Om Tietoevry Tech Services**
 Tietoevry Tech Services är i en påbörjad spännande resa under nytt ägandeskap. Denna förändring öppnar upp för nya möjligheter, utmaningar och tillväxtmöjligheter för vårt företag och våra anställda. Vi söker efter talangfulla personer som vill följa med oss på denna spännande resa och hjälpa till att forma den digitala landskapet i Norden.
   

  

 På Tietoevry Tech Services specialiserar vi oss på att driva digital transformation. Vår expertis ligger i att hjälpa nordiska verksamheter och bolag genom att modernisera och utveckla processer, applikationer och infrastruktur, samt tillhandahålla pålitliga, säkra och effektiva IT-tjänster. Under nytt ägandeskap kommer vi att fortsätta forma framtiden för teknologi i Norden tillsammans med våra kunder.
   

  

 At Tietoevry, we believe in the power of diversity, equity, and inclusion. We encourage applicants of all backgrounds, genders (m/f/d), and walks of life to join our team, as we believe that this fosters an inspiring workplace and fuels innovation. Our commitment to openness, trust, and diversity is at the heart of our mission to create digital futures that benefit businesses, societies, and humanity. Diversity, equity and inclusion (tietoevry.com)
