title: Nattreceptionist Downtown Camper by Scandic
description:
Välkommen till ett inspirerande livsstilshotell med en atmosfär som främjar gemenskap, kreativitet, nyfikenhet och upptäckarglädje! Downtown Camper erbjuder inte bara nattsömn och god mat och dryck, utan allt från yoga till upptäcktsfärder och inspirationsföreläsningar. Här står mötet i fokus – mötet mellan natur och storstad, och mellan stockholmare och inresande. Vi vill att hotellet ska vara ett självklart basecamp för äventyrslystna upptäckare. Vi som arbetar på Downtown Camper i dag tycker vi har en rolig arbetsplats, fantastiska kollegor, bra ledarskap och en härlig atmosfär. Så är du en social, naturälskande storstadsmänniska? Då kan du vara den vi söker.


**Nu söker vi en nattreceptionist till Downtown Camper by Scandic.**



Oavsett varför gästen kommer till oss är det få saker som är så uppskattade som ett vänligt ansikte som hälsar välkommen. Du agerar värd tillsammans med övriga teamet på hotellet och skapar en gästupplevelse i världsklass.



Hos oss får du ta ett stort eget ansvar för att ta de beslut som krävs för att göra gästen nöjd och teamen utvecklar och förbättrar arbetssätt och service i takt med att omvärlden förändras. Vi är nämligen övertygade om att det är när du får utvecklas och bidra med all din kompetens och erfarenhet som vi överträffar gästens förväntningar. På köpet får vi kul på jobbet!



Så ta med dig dina erfarenheter, ditt engagemang och ditt sätt att tänka till oss – och bidra till en kultur där vi bryr oss på riktigt: om varandra, våra gäster och vår planet. Välkommen till Scandic!


**Vad är innebär rollen?**



Du som arbetar i receptionen är ansvarig för att våra gäster får service i världsklass. Du är spindeln i nätet som ser till att gästen alltid är i fokus. Du är den som går igenom ankomstlistan och lägger tid på detaljerna. Ser till att gästens önskemål uppfylls. Du har alltid ett leende på läpparna och en kreativ lösning i bakfickan. Du löser det mesta och är en stjärna på att vända en missnöjd gäst till en nöjd gäst. Din arbetsplats är vår lobby. För det är där du möter flest gäster. I ansvarsområdet ingår även administrativt arbete, säkerhetsarbete och arbete med försäljning.


Arbetet i receptionen innebär att checka in och ut hotellets gäster, hälsa välkommen och ge gästen den information den behöver om sin vistelse. Du hanterar bokningar i systemet Opera Cloud och hanterar administrativa uppgifter runt gäster och säkerhet. Allt arbete sker med gästnöjdhet och försäljning i fokus.


Hotellet har öppet dygnet runt och vi säker någon som vill arbeta natt varannan vecka. Arbetstiderna är förlagda mellan 22:00-07:30 (vardagar och helger).


**Vem är du?**



För att passa i rollen tror vi att du har en väl utvecklad social förmåga och är kapabel att hantera att det händer många olika saker samtidigt. Det är mycket viktigt att du kan förmedla ett gott värdskap till hotellets gäster.



Du har också vana och kunskap i att arbeta med dator som arbetsredskap.


Eftersom arbetet till stor del består av att kommunicera med gäster är goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska en förutsättning. Talar du ytterligare ett språk är det meriterande.


Allra viktigast är dock dina personliga egenskaper och din inställning. För att passa i rollen behöver du vara en lyhörd och prestigelös lagspelare som tar ett stort ansvar för dina arbetsuppgifter och helhetsresultatet.


**Information om tjänsten**



Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning på deltid.


Vi tillämpar 6 månaders provanställning.



Vi tar enbart emot ansökningar via vår hemsida. Alla ansökningar kommer att behandlas löpande och tjänsten kan tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag, varför vi ber dig att ansöka så snart som möjligt. I denna rekrytering använder vi oss av ett enklare test om service vid urvalet.



Vi ser fram emot att välkomna dig till oss på Scandic!



Ps. på vår hemsida kan du läsa mer om vår kultur, vad tjänsten innebär och om våra förmåner!


  
* Vana av nattarbete i hotellreception.
* Systemvana av olika PMS system inom hotellverksamhet.

  
**Vi har riktigt bra förmåner**
-------------------------------

Rabatt när du äter, dricker och övernattar hos oss


Family & Friends rabatt för din familj och vänner


Rabatt hos våra partnerföretag


Pension & försäkringar enligt kollektivavtal


Friskvårdsbidrag


Utbildning och utveckling via interna plattformar


  
Vi når längre när olikheter bejakas. Hos oss får du utrymme att vara dig själv och utvecklas i den riktning du vill, med trygga villkor och schyssta avtal som grund. Ta med dig dina erfarenheter, ditt engagemang och ditt sätt att tänka till oss - bidra till en kultur där vi bryr oss på riktigt: om varandra, våra gäster och vår planet. Välkommen till Scandic.



Delar du våra värderingar?


**BE A PRO** **BE YOU** **BE CARING** **BE BOLD**

  

  

...uppmuntrar alla att göra skillnad för miljön och att det var en av våra kollegor inom housekeeping som kom på idén om ”häng-upp-handduken”.
...i Sverige blivit rankad som besöksnäringens mest attraktiva arbetsgivare två år i rad, i Visitas årliga undersökning.
... bara serverar kaffe som är ekologiskt och Fairtrade eller UTZ-certifierat.
...tack vare vårt stora miljöengagemang, blivit rankad som branschens mest hållbara arbetsgivare elva år i rad, av Sustainable Brand Index.
...under 2014 inledde ett samarbete med organisationen Real Stars, centrerat kring ”Fair Sex”, dvs. arbete mot människo- och sexhandel.
company_addresses:
Scandic Hotels Deutschland GmbH
Gabriele-Tergit-Promenade 19
10963 Berlin
company_description: Nordiskt hotellföretag i världsklass som skapar enastående upplevelser för de många människorna. 16 000 medarbetar, 280 hotell i 6 länder.

title: Computer Vision Engineer - [F/M/X]
description:
Who are we?
  
Amaris Consulting is an independent technology consulting firm providing guidance and solutions to businesses. With more than 1000 clients across the globe, we have been rolling out solutions in major projects for over a decade – this is made possible by an international team of 7,600 people spread across 5 continents and more than 60 countries. Our solutions focus on four different Business Lines: Information System & Digital, Telecom, Life Sciences and Engineering. We’re focused on building and nurturing a top talent community where all our team members can achieve their full potential. Amaris is your steppingstone to cross rivers of change, meet challenges and achieve all your projects with success.
  
  

At Amaris, we strive to provide our candidates with the best possible recruitment experience. We like to get to know our candidates, challenge them, and be able to give them proper feedback as quickly as possible. Here's what our recruitment process looks like:
  
  

**Brief Call:** Our process typically begins with a brief virtual/phone conversation to get to know you! The objective? Learn about you, understand your motivations, and make sure we have the right job for you!
  
  

Interviews (the average number of interviews is 3 - the number may vary depending on the level of seniority required for the position). During the interviews, you will meet people from our team: your line manager of course, but also other people related to your future role. We will talk in depth about you, your experience, and skills, but also about the position and what will be expected of you. Of course, you will also get to know Amaris: our culture, our roots, our teams, and your career opportunities!
  
  

**Case study:** Depending on the position, we may ask you to take a test. This could be a role play, a technical assessment, a problem-solving scenario, etc.
  
  

As you know, every person is different and so is every role in a company. That is why we have to adapt accordingly, and the process may differ slightly at times. However, please know that we always put ourselves in the candidate's shoes to ensure they have the best possible experience.
  
We look forward to meeting you!
  
  

Job description
  
  

**Mission Description:**  

We are looking for a skilled and motivated engineer to help shape the future of intelligent video analysis through advanced Deep Learning technologies. You will join a technology-focused team working on developing cutting-edge algorithms and analytics features for a range of platforms, including embedded systems, servers, and cloud environments.
  
  

This is a hands-on role that blends research with production-level development, focusing on solving complex technical challenges. A key area of responsibility involves generating high-quality training data for machine learning models — with synthetic data and graphic realism playing an increasingly important role. You'll be part of a collaborative and technically strong team that values innovation, curiosity, and shared success.
  
  

**Profile Requirement:**  

We are seeking an experienced engineer with a strong interest in video analytics, synthetic data generation, and computer graphics. You are a structured and pragmatic individual with a curious mindset and excellent collaboration skills.
  
  

You likely have an engineering background and professional experience in game graphics or visual design.
  
  

**Preferred qualifications:**  

Experience with synthetic data generation for Deep Learning applications
  
  

Proficiency in tools such as Unreal Engine, Houdini, or Blender
  
  

Knowledge of procedural content generation and a strong eye for creating realistic materials, textures, and lighting
  
  

Previous experience in technical leadership or similar roles
  
  

Amaris Consulting is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. We are committed to promoting diversity within the workforce and creating an inclusive working environment. For this purpose, we welcome applications from all qualified candidates regardless of gender, sexual orientation, race, ethnicity, beliefs, age, marital status, disability, or other characteristics.
company_description: Amaris Consulting is an independent technology consulting firm providing guidance and solutions to businesses. It gathers more than 7,500 people across 5 continents and more than 60 countries.

title: Marketing Automation Specialist
description:
Ansök senast: 13 juni 2025 Stockholm Hybrid
Ansök nu


**Vill du utföra en transformationsresa inom MarTech på PwC? Ser du dig själv som en superuser och förstår möjligheterna med Salesforce Marketing Cloud? Vi hoppas på det! Vi söker dig som har några års erfarenhet av marketing automation och är tekniskt kunnig för att utveckla vårt MarTech-arbete ytterligare.**


**Bli en del av Client & Marketing Development**



Rollen är baserad i Stockholm, där du kommer att vara en del av Client & Market Development (CMD) som är PwC:s avdelning för kommunikation, marknad och försäljning. Du kommer arbeta nära flera av teamen inom CMD, men också samarbeta med en rad olika intressenter i organisationen. I rollen förväntas du också bygga globala kontakter inom PwC-nätverket där du är delaktig i att bidra till utvecklingen och kravställer på MarTech-området.


**Dina huvudsakliga uppgifter**



I rollen som Marketing Automation Specialist kommer du att arbeta med Salesforce Marketing Cloud och främst ur ett tekniskt perspektiv. Din uppgift blir att säkerställa att befintliga processer fungerar och fortsätta utvecklingen framåt för en optimal kundupplevelse. Givetvis tycker du om att analysera och tolka kunddata. Du använder din kreativitet för att utforska olika lösningar på komplexa utmaningar. Vi ser också att du med din tidigare erfarenhet kan bidra i arbetet med att skapa och utveckla våra automatiserade flöden och kunddialoger i systemet. Som specialist är det då viktigt att du kan och vill sprida kunskap om möjligheterna och potentialen i Salesforce Marketing Cloud.


Ytterligare exempel på där vi ser att du som specialist kan bidra:


* Säkerställa teknisk funktionalitet och äga utveckling.
* Analysera kunddata och skapa målgrupper.
* Stötta processen och identifiera leads (MQL/SQL).
* Ta fram fördjupad statistik, uppföljning och optimera mot målsättningar.
* Utveckla nya kommunikationsflöden som stöttar affären.
* Bidra med systemkunskap i större satsningar tillsammans med andra specialister.
* Hantera, optimera och övervaka pågående automationer.
* Leverera resultat utifrån uppsatta mål och riktmärken och delar insikter i syfte att optimera framtida kommunikationer.


**Vi söker dig som**



Du är en teknisk- och systemorienterad samarbetsinriktad kollega. Du är idérik, kommunikativ och engagerad inom ditt specialistområde, och tar initiativ för att lösa komplexa problem. I rollen omvandlar du strategier och önskemål från organisationen till kundflöden i systemet. Du har förmågan att skapa tillitsfulla relationer och är öppen för andras åsikter. Givetvis ser vi att du har ett stort intresse för teknik inom MarTech och dess möjligheter samt att du tycker att kunddata och analys är en del av vardagen.


**Kvalifikationer**


* Minst tre års erfarenhet av Marketing Automation.
* Erfarenhet av relevant Marketing Automation- plattform (exempelvis Salesforce Marketing Cloud).
* HTML/CSS/SQL.
* Analys av kunddata/skapa målgruppsselektioner.
* Datadriven kundkommunikation i processer.
* Webb-/epostdesign och optimering.
* Marknadsföring i digitala kanaler.


Vi har riktigt bra förmåner


Stärkt föräldrapenning


Flyttdag


Flextid


Sommartid


Hållbarhetsdagar


Sjukvårdsförsäkring


**Rekryteringsprocessen**



Vi kommer att gå igenom ansökningarna löpande och tjänsten kan tillsättas tidigare än sista ansökningsdagen.


**Vi ber dig bifoga följande handlingar med din ansökan:**


* CV

Vi tror på att ha en rekryteringsprocess som gäller för alla. För att bidra till en opartisk och rättvis urvalsprocess inkluderar vi arbetspsykologiska tester.



Vi värdesätter det personliga mötet för att se vilket värde just du kan tillföra PwC men också vad vi kan erbjuda dig. Intervjuprocessen består vanligtvis av flera steg och olika typer av intervjuer. När du träffar HR, har du en kompetensbaserad intervju där vi tittar på personlighetstestet som du genomfört innan intervjun. Vid intervjun med verksamheten får du möjlighet att träffa det aktuella teamet för att gå igenom rollen. Vi kallar till intervju löpande.


**Syftesdrivet och innovativt arbete**
**Inkluderande ledarskap och lagarbete**
**En arbetsplats där medarbetarna står i fokus**
**Oändligt med utvecklingsmöjligheter**
**Flexibelt arbete**
PwC Sverige är marknadsledande inom revision och rådgivning med över 3 200 medarbetare runt om i landet – vi finns där du finns! Vårt syfte är att skapa förtroende i samhället och lösa viktiga problem och våra värderingar genomsyrar allt vi gör.



Vi är proaktiva rådgivare som drivs av att förstå dig och våra övriga 22 000 kunders verkliga behov och hitta lösningar på komplexa affärsutmaningar – oavsett vilken fas din verksamhet befinner sig i. Det som gör oss unika är att vi kombinerar den senaste tekniken och samverkan mellan våra specialister. Vi är en community of solvers som är med dig hela vägen!



PwC Sverige är en självständig och oberoende juridisk enhet som ingår i det globala PwC-nätverket med 370 000 medarbetare i 149 länder. Det gör att vi kan dela med oss av kunskaper och erfarenheter globalt och tillsammans leverera relevanta lösningar som skapar förtroende och långsiktigt hållbara värden för såväl våra kunder som samhället i stort.

title: Sales Development Representative - Nordics
description:
**About Nerdio**

  

Nerdio adds value on top of the powerful capabilities in Azure Virtual Desktop, Windows 365, and Microsoft Intune by delivering hundreds of features that simplify management, ensure efficient operations, and lower Azure compute and storage costs by up to 80% via automation.

  

Leveraging Nerdio, partners can manage customers’ cloud environments through streamlined, multi-tenant, workflow-powered technology that allows them to create and grow cloud-based recurring revenues. Enterprise IT professionals can deliver and maintain a wide range of virtual Windows endpoints across hybrid workforces with ease and fine-tune end-user computing (EUC) approaches for maximum effectiveness using powerful monitoring and analytics capabilities.

  

We are a fast-moving, nimble company looking for individuals who are collaborative, empathetic, driven and who love to move at the speed of light. If you want to be part of the AVD and W365 transformation that Microsoft and Nerdio are leading, then we want to speak with you.

 **About the role**

  

As an Enterprise SDR, you will work with sales teams worldwide. You will engage with prospects to uncover opportunities where Nerdio can plug in and help companies deploy, manage, and optimize AVD and W365.

  

We need relationship builders with a strong understanding of VDI and EUC technologies to continue to grow our most prized partnership with Microsoft and its sales teams. You must be highly motivated and take an entrepreneurial approach to growing the relationship and revenue in addition to being a team player.

  

Our ideal SDR is highly skilled and has a partnership-selling approach.

  

You’ll be juggling lots of prospect engagements at the same time, so being organized and having a positive outlook are key. Don’t be afraid to ask those stupid questions; working together is how we roll here!

  

Integrity means everything to us, so you will need to do what you say you are going to do. This may involve coordinating with other departments in the wider team, using your excellent listening, written, and verbal communication skills!

 **What you'll do**

* Collaborate with the sales teams to identify AVD and W365 opportunities and align with Microsoft's sales teams, channel partners, and direct customers.
* Prospect with a focus on both inbound and outbound selling motions
* Achieve quarterly quota targets set by your leadership team
* Leverage sales engagement tools to generate pipeline via phone, emails, and social interactions.
* Use a partnership selling approach to uncover, qualify, and create AVD, W365 and Nerdio opportunities.
* Effectively communicate Nerdio's value proposition, capabilities, and benefits to potential customers.
* Work closely with the sales team to develop and execute strategies to meet sales targets.
* Juggle multiple leads simultaneously, maintaining organization and a positive outlook.
* Coordinate with other departments to ensure customer needs and projects are delivered successfully.
* Demonstrate integrity and follow through on commitments to ensure customer satisfaction.
* Continuously learn and stay up-to-date with industry trends, product knowledge, and sales techniques.

**Qualifications**

* A minimum of 1-3 years of experience in Sales or Business Development or a similar sales role, preferably in the technology industry, selling cloud computing, IT services, or software-as-a-service (SaaS).
* Familiarity with Microsoft Azure and other cloud technologies.
* Proven track record of achieving sales targets and quotas.
* Familiarity with sales techniques and processes, including lead generation, prospecting, qualifying leads, and creating deals.
* Strong communication to effectively convey the value proposition of the company's products or services.
* Ability to understand customer needs and identify opportunities for upselling or cross-selling.
* Experience with CRM software and other sales tools for managing and tracking customer interactions.
* Experience in conducting product demonstrations or presentations to potential customers.
* Proven expertise in partnership selling and building relationships with key stakeholders
* Highly motivated and self-driven with an entrepreneurial mindset.
* Fluent in English and either Danish, Swedish or Norwegian

**Benefits and Incentives**

* Competitive Base + Incentive Plan
* Stock Options
* Health and Welfare Plans\*
* Life and Disability Plans\*
* Retirement Plan\*
* Unlimited Flexible Paid Time Off, including your birthday off!
* Collaborative Team Culture
* Benefits for international employees, outside the US, vary by country.

  

Nerdio is committed to a diverse and inclusive workplace. Nerdio is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate on the basis of race, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, protected veteran status, disability, age, or other legally protected status.

 **The pay range for this role is:**  

50,000 - 70,000 USD per year(Remote)

title: Distinguished Engineer, Embedded Systems Architect
description:
About Analog Devices
Analog Devices, Inc. (NASDAQ: ADI ) is a global semiconductor leader that bridges the physical and digital worlds to enable breakthroughs at the Intelligent Edge. ADI combines analog, digital, and software technologies into solutions that help drive advancements in digitized factories, mobility, and digital healthcare, combat climate change, and reliably connect humans and the world. With revenue of more than $9 billion in FY24 and approximately 24,000 people globally, ADI ensures today's innovators stay Ahead of What's Possible™. Learn more at www.analog.com and on LinkedIn and Twitter (X).  

As the Software Lead/Architect, you will play a key role in the design and development of software solutions for our data center power products. You will work with a team of talented software engineers and collaborate closely with hardware engineers, product managers, and other cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality, reliable, and scalable software (firmware, drivers, tools, etc) for data center products.
The ideal candidate will have deep expertise in power management technologies, including PMBus (Power Management Bus) and OpenBMC (Open Baseboard Management Controller), and will be passionate about shaping the architecture and direction of next-generation data center power management software.
Key Responsibilities:* Lead the design and development of software solutions for data center power products, focusing on power management, monitoring, and control.
* Architect and implement software for power supply units (PSUs), power distribution units (PDUs), and other related components using PMBus and OpenBMC standards.
* Collaborate with hardware engineers to ensure seamless integration of software and hardware components for power management systems.
* Drive best practices in software engineering, including code quality, testing, and documentation.
* Lead and mentor a team of software engineers, providing technical guidance and fostering an environment of continuous improvement and learning.
* Define and enforce software architecture, ensuring scalability, reliability, and maintainability of the solutions.
* Engage in HW/SW co-design, ensuring close collaboration between hardware and software teams to optimize power management system performance and functionality.
* Work closely with product managers and stakeholders to define software requirements and translate them into technical specifications.
* Evaluate new technologies and tools to continuously improve software development processes and product performance.
* Ensure compliance with industry standards and regulations for power management and data center operations.
* Troubleshoot complex technical issues and provide solutions to maintain optimal product performance.


Required Qualifications:* Bachelor's or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or a related field.
* 7+ years of software development experience, with at least 3 years in a leadership or architectural role.
* Desired strong expertise in PMBus (Power Management Bus) protocol and its application in data center power systems.
* Desired experience with OpenBMC, including the development and integration of firmware for baseboard management controllers in server environments.
* Proficiency in programming languages such as C, C++, Python, or Go.
* Experience with embedded systems development and real-time operating systems (RTOS).
* Solid understanding of power management systems, including power supply, voltage regulation, and monitoring in data centers.
* Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to troubleshoot complex system-level issues.
* Excellent communication skills, with the ability to effectively collaborate across engineering teams, product managers, and other stakeholders.
* Experience with Agile development methodologies and continuous integration/deployment (CI/CD) practices.


Preferred Qualifications:* Experience with other data center technologies such as networking, storage, and server management.
* Familiarity with cloud infrastructure and services.
* Knowledge of hardware/software co-design principles.
* Experience with version control systems such as Git.

*For positions requiring access to technical data, Analog Devices, Inc. may have to obtain export licensing approval from the U.S. Department of Commerce - Bureau of Industry and Security and/or the U.S. Department of State - Directorate of Defense Trade Controls. As such, applicants for this position – except US Citizens, US Permanent Residents, and protected individuals as defined by 8 U.S.C. 1324b(a)(3) – may have to go through an export licensing review process.**Analog Devices is an equal opportunity employer. We foster a culture where everyone has an opportunity to succeed regardless of their race, color, religion, age, ancestry, national origin, social or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, gender expression, marital status, pregnancy, parental status, disability, medical condition, genetic information, military or veteran status, union membership, and political affiliation, or any other legally protected group.*
Job Req Type: Experienced  


Required Travel: Yes, 10% of the time  


Shift Type: 1st Shift/Days

title: Platform Engineer
description:
**Platform Engineer**  

  

We are the newly established Data Platform Services team within Telia Technology Analytics Platforms unit. Our mission is to deliver top-tier, purpose-built, and value-driven capabilities in Data and AI to Telia. We believe that enhancing analytical capabilities is crucial for boosting Telia’s operational efficiency, improving our product offerings, and elevating customer experience. To accomplish this, we provide a unified set of tools designed to meet the needs of every country.
  

  

My name is Mikko Olin, Head of Data Platform Services, and I am seeking team members who are enthusiastic about collaborating closely with our on-premises open-source data Lakehouse, Arcus, in Sweden. Arcus is our next-generation analytics platform, enabling in-country analytics with Lakehouse capabilities. It is built entirely on open-source technology with dedicated hardware and extensive GPU computing power. Our latest iteration supports near real-time use cases, ML Ops, relational databases (Postgres), and GenAI.
  

  

**Is this you?**  

  

You excel at analyzing complex problems, articulating suggested solutions, developing them, and collaborating with colleagues when needed. You take ownership of your responsibilities and are an excellent communicator.
  

  

Your personality:


* Team player
* Self-motivated with learning mindset
* Understand business value and demonstrate it in implemented solutions
Good storytelling skills  
* 

  

We would like you to have experience from some of the below:


* Python
* Managing Kubernetes deployments and infrastructure
* Experience with Apache Spark, Apache Airflow and Trino
* IAC using Helm and Ansible
* Setting up CI/CD pipelines
GitHub & GitHub Actions  
* 

  

Bonus if you also have experience from:


* Setting up data analytics platforms using cloud native components in Kubernetes
* Nvidia AI stack
* DBT (data build tool)
Data warehouse & analytics background  
* 

  

**We are more than a workplace**  

  

Join Telia and our inclusive team and collaborate with over 15,000 talented colleagues from around the globe. Recognized as a Climate Leader in the Nordics and Baltics, we're passionate about creating great products and delivering extraordinary customer experiences while always prioritizing sustainability. We believe our people are our most valuable asset, ensuring everyone feels welcome and valued. When you join us, you'll receive a comprehensive benefits package tailored to your local market, opportunities for remote work, and more. You'll also have the chance to earn a bonus based on your performance and Telia's results. If you want to make a real impact, this is the place where you belong.
  

  

**Interested?**  

  

If you fancy joining our team, don’t hesitate to apply! If you want to know more about the job, reach out to Mikko Olin, mikko.olin@teliacompany.com
  

  

We look forward to receiving your application and to make sure that your personal data is kept safely, we kindly ask you to apply through our recruitment system. We are not able to handle resumes via e-mail or equivalent. Selection will take place on an ongoing basis and this position might be filled before the application deadline. Application deadline is **2025-06-04**  

  

**Join us and let's make better happen - together!**

title: Enterprise Architect
description:
If you’re a tech-savvy visionary who thrives on turning complexity into clarity and wants to influence how technology drives business at scale, this is your moment. As our new Enterprise Architect, you’ll be at the heart of a transformation journey, helping us connect strategy with scalable, future-ready platforms that deliver real value to our customers and teams worldwide.
Some words about us
Sandvik Mining and Rock Solutions (SMR) is a global leading supplier in equipment and tools, parts, service and technical solutions for the mining and infrastructure industries – bringing value to customers through high-performing products and solutions that increase productivity and safety. Our company strategy emphasizes the need to drive business and operational digitalization, enable seamless connectivity across the enterprise, and ensure we have agility when we develop our company. You’ll join a forward-thinking organization where your voice is heard, your expertise is valued, and your work has a global impact.
About your job  

In this role, you’re a front-runner in shaping and governing our global technology- and platform strategies and architecture, while guiding our organization towards the desired results. Your mission is to ensure our technical platforms are modern, secure, interoperable, and scaled to an enterprise level – fully aligned with our digital transformation goals. You define the architectural principles, cloud-first strategies, and platform-centric models, ensuring that we can work in an efficient and agile manner.
As a key player in our enterprise-wide development community, you collaborate across teams to ensure our digital solutions are both business-fit and future-ready. You work closely with our business and domain architects to ensure our technology platforms – from ERP and CRM to data and integration – are optimized, resilient, and deliver expected value. You evaluate emerging technologies, drive standardization where it is required, and provide architectural expertise that influences strategic and tactical decisions at the highest levels.
You’ll work in a hybrid setup, with your base in either Stockholm, Tampere or Dublin. Reporting to the Head of Enterprise Architecture at SMR, you play a central part in connecting our strategic ambitions with the technical foundation needed to achieve them.
Your profile  

You bring extensive experience in technology leadership, with deep knowledge of enterprise and platform architecture, including perspectives such as business capabilities, processes, data and technology. You’re well-versed in cloud transformation, platform engineering, and API-led integration. You’ve worked with platforms like SAP, Salesforce, and Azure, and you hold relevant certifications for this type of role. Experience with agile methods and tools is a big plus, especially within large and global companies. A degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or a related field is essential.
You’re a natural collaborator and leader who inspires and motivates others – even when opinions differ – and you’re able to guide and coach through change. Being solution-oriented, positive, and comfortable navigating complexity comes natural to you. You think value-first, then solve the root cause problems with agility and creativity. You understand the power of teamwork and know how to align technology with business goals.
Our culture
At Sandvik, we’re tech driven, innovative and entrepreneurial. We believe that success is a team effort so we value diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive culture where people can be themselves and reach their full potential. So, we invest in supporting each other, learning together and celebrating our differences. Visit our stories hub, LinkedIn or Facebook to get to know us further.
Contact information
For further information about this position, please contact Jesper Westin, hiring manager, at jesper.westin@sandvik.com
We’ve already decided on which advertising channels and marketing campaigns we wish to use and respectfully decline any additional contacts in that matter.

How to apply
Send your application no later than June 8, 2025. Click apply and include your resume and cover letter in English. Please note that we don’t accept applications by e-mail. Job ID: R0079243.
As we aim for a fair recruitment process, we utilize assessment tools to safeguard objectivity. When you apply for this job, you will therefore receive an invitation via email to a personality and logic ability test. Feedback comes immediately after the test has been completed and the selection process begins after the application deadline.
To learn more about our recruitment process, please visit our career site or contact HR Services at hrservices.sweden@sandvik.com.*Sandvik Mining and Rock Solutions is a business area within the Sandvik Group and a global leading supplier of equipment and tools, parts, service,* *digital solutions* *and* *sustainability-driving* *technologies for the mining and construction industries. Application areas include rock drilling, rock cutting, loading and hauling, tunneling and quarrying.* *In 2024, sales were approximately 63,6 billion SEK with about 17,000 employees.*

title: Global HR Business Partner
description:
Sinch is pioneering the way the world communicates. More than 150,000 businesses — including Google, Uber, Paypal, Visa, Tinder, and many others — rely on Sinch’s Customer Communications Cloud to power engaging customer experiences through mobile messaging, voice, and email.
  
Whether you need to verify users or craft omnichannel campaigns, Sinch makes it easy. Our AI-infused Super Network, APIs, and applications ensure you can connect with your customers reliably and securely, at every step of their journey.
  
At Sinch we “Dream Big”, “Win Together”, “Keep it simple”, and “Make it Happen”. These values are our foundation!
  
  

**The essence of the role :**  

As Global HR Business Partner, you will be located in Stockholm, Sweden, and you will report to the Head of HR EMEA. You will be part of a global HR team and work closely with leaders in different countries, alongside global and country HRBPs, as well as HR specialists in our Global HR Communities of Practice.
  
  

**As our new Gloabl HR Business Partner you will:**  

* Act as a trusted strategic HR Business Partner to senior leaders across Engineering and Product.
* Provide expert HR guidance and hands-on support in areas such as organizational development, workforce planning, and talent strategy.
* Lead and support global HR initiatives and processes to align with both business goals and regional needs.
* Drive people aspects of organizational change, transformation initiatives, and business performance improvements.
* Collaborate on and influence the development of future-proof organizational structures and capabilities.
* Coach and advise leaders through complex people matters, including team effectiveness, leadership development, and organizational change.
* Support and facilitate compensation and benefits planning, ensuring alignment with global frameworks and local practices.
* Guide and ensure consistency in performance management, succession planning, and career development efforts.
* Contribute regional and functional insights to shape the global HR agenda and influence cross-company HR strategies.
* Partner with HR colleagues to harmonize HR practices and help create a unified, consistent employee experience across geographies.
* Use data and analytics to identify trends, support decision-making, and proactively address workforce issues.
* Serve as a cultural ambassador, supporting the integration of company values into everyday HR practices and leadership behavior.


**In order to be successful in this role, we believe you have:** :
  
  

* More than 10 years of experience as an HR Business Partner or HR manager in a global environment.
* A wide range of HR expertise spanning various HR areas including workforce planning, organizational design and change management, job role frameworks and career planning, performance development, compensation and benefits, and overall operational excellence in HR.
* Project management capability: you possess the expertise to seamlessly define, structure, and lead various HR initiatives, applying a project-oriented approach
* You're a go-getter, someone who takes the initiative, steer your work independently and thrive in fast-paced environments and have the agility and resilience to adjust to change. You love bringing order to things .
* Your verbal and written communication skills in English are top-notch and people trust you easily at all levels, thanks to your excellent relationship-building skills
* You're highly proficient in Microsoft Office programs


Our corporate language is English, please submit your application in English.
  
Submit your application no later than June 4, 2025.
  
  

Are you ready? Join us on our journey!
  
About the recruitment process
  
To help us place the right people in the right role, we believe in science-based and fair assessment methods. We follow a competence-based, structured interview process where your skills, experience, and attributes relevant to the role and Sinch will be assessed. As part of our recruitment process, pre-employment testing is used to help us increase our hiring success by identifying the candidates that are most likely to thrive and be successful in the role. We acknowledge that there are two parties deciding in this process and welcome you to ask any questions you may have at any stage of the process.

title: Molnspecialist
description:
Uppdrag – Molntekniker med inriktning på säkerhet och infrastruktur
  
Vi söker en erfaren molntekniker med djup kunskap inom IT-säkerhet och moderna molnlösningar för ett uppdrag där du ansvarar för granskning och förbättring av en digital tjänsts tekniska plattform.
  
Tjänsten är ett webbaserat bibliotek som tillhandahåller litteratur på flera språk och är tillgänglig för användare i flera nordiska länder. Lösningen är frikopplad från övriga biblioteksplattformar och har en egenutvecklad teknisk infrastruktur som inkluderar användarhantering, innehållsleverans och ett skräddarsytt CMS. Tjänstens backend körs huvudsakligen i en molnmiljö baserad på Google Cloud Platform.
  
Om uppdraget
  
En tidigare översiktlig analys har identifierat ett antal säkerhetsbrister kopplade till bland annat nätverkssegmentering, användarhantering och versioner av centrala komponenter. Din roll blir att genomföra en fördjupad granskning av molninfrastrukturen, dokumentera identifierade brister, bedöma risknivåer och därefter genomföra rekommenderade åtgärder. Du kommer att arbeta nära systemförvaltningen och löpande återrapportera resultat och framsteg.
  
  

**Förväntade leveranser:**  

En heltäckande säkerhets- och konfigurationsanalys av systemets backendmiljö
  
En åtgärdsplan med prioriterade förbättringspunkter
  
Säkerställd användarhantering enligt vedertagna säkerhetsprinciper
  
Uppgradering av molnresurser till långsiktigt stödda versioner (t.ex. CloudSQL och Kubernetes)
  
Genomgång och justering av nätverksinställningar och brandväggar för att uppnå en rimlig säkerhetsnivå per subnät
  
  

**Obligatoriska kvalifikationer:**  

Minst fem års erfarenhet av konfiguration och administration i Google Cloud Platform
  
Djup teknisk kunskap inom Node.js, GraphQL, Hasura, Kubernetes och CloudSQL
  
Dokumenterad erfarenhet av att arbeta med säkerhetslösningar för IT-infrastruktur
  
Vana vid avancerad säkerhetskonfiguration i molnmiljöer
  
Erfarenhet av arbete med Firebase
  
Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska, både i tal och skrift
  
  

Omfattning och tidsramar
  
Uppdraget är planerat att starta omgående och pågå till mitten av juni, med möjlighet till förlängning. Uppskattad arbetsinsats omfattar en inledande introduktion, analysfas samt genomförande av åtgärder under cirka två arbetsveckor. Viss flexibilitet finns för arbete på distans, men närvaro på plats kan förekomma.
  
Ansökan
  
**För att bli aktuell för uppdraget ska du inkomma med följande:**
  
Uppdaterat CV på svenska
  
Genomförandeplan med förslag på arbetsmetod
  
Tillgänglighet för uppdragets start
  
En kort motivering till varför du är rätt person för uppdraget, med referenser till tidigare erfarenheter, uppdrag eller utbildningar
  
  

Om Rasulson Consulting
  
Rasulson Consulting är ett specialiserat bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag inom IT-sektorn. Vi samarbetar med ledande tech-bolag och innovativa startupföretag för att erbjuda spännande karriärmöjligheter för dig med intresse för digital utveckling. Genom vår djupa tekniska förståelse och vårt starka nätverk kan vi snabbt matcha rätt kompetenser med rätt uppdrag. Hos oss får du personlig vägledning, regelbunden återkoppling och möjligheten att ta nästa steg i din IT-karriär.

title: Senior Computer Vision Engineer till bolag i Malmö
description:
The company are developing next-generation technology to make urban traffic safer.
  
We are now looking for an experienced and passionate Senior Computer Vision Engineer to join our team. In this role, you will lead the development of the perception stack for our unique 3D sensor technology which includes event cameras. The successful candidate will be responsible for designing, implementing, and optimizing algorithms for object detection, tracking, and other related tasks, with a focus on safety applications and low latency requirements. In this role, you will work closely with our engineering team, which includes both software and hardware specialists. You’ll be part of a collaborative and open-minded team where we tackle challenges together, and every idea and contribution counts. Role and responsibilities Develop and optimize perception models for 3D point cloud processing. Design and implement real-time object detection, classification, and tracking algorithms based on 3D point cloud.
  
Collaborate with multiple sub teams including software engineers and hardware engineers to integrate perception stack into end-to-end system.
  
Conduct performance analysis and optimization to meet stringent latency and accuracy requirements.
  
Stay up to date with the latest advancements in computer vision, machine learning, and sensor technologies, and apply them to enhance our perception stack.
  
About you Master's or Ph.D. in Computer Science, Engineering Physics, Automation, Electrical Engineering, or related field with a focus on computer vision, machine learning, deep learning, or robotics.
  
Strong proficiency in programming languages such as Python, C++, and experience with libraries such as, TensorFlow, or PyTorch.Solid understanding of fundamental computer vision concepts including feature extraction, object detection, tracking, and recognition.
  
Minimum of 5 years of industry experience in developing computer vision algorithms for real-world applications, preferably in the automotive or robotics domain.
  
Experience from development of deterministic models as well as perception models. Experience with 3D sensor technologies (e.g., Event cameras, LiDAR, depth cameras) and point cloud processing.
  
Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to work independently as well as in a team-oriented environment.
  
Effective communication skills and ability to present technical concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.

title: EUC Architect
description:
**Wipro Limited (NYSE:** WIT, BSE: 507685, NSE: WIPRO) is a leading global information technology, consulting and business process services company. We harness the power of cognitive computing, hyper-automation, robotics, cloud, analytics and emerging technologies to help our clients adapt to the digital world and make them successful. A company recognized globally for its comprehensive portfolio of services, strong commitment to sustainability and good corporate citizenship, we have over 240,000 dedicated employees serving clients across six continents. Together, we discover ideas and connect the dots to build a better and a bold new future.

Manage and maintain the Microsoft System Centre Suite 2016/2019, ensuring optimal performance and security.
  
Oversee the Configuration Manager – Current Branch, including updates, patches, and system configurations.

Handle MAC operating systems such as Sonoma, Sequoia, 14.xx & 15.xx, including troubleshooting and updates.
  
Integrate and manage Microsoft Intune for MDM (Android, iOS, Windows) and PC management, ensuring compliance and security.
  
Utilize Operations Manager 2016 to monitor and manage IT infrastructure, ensuring system reliability and performance.
  
Implement and manage Microsoft Enterprise Mobility and Security Suite, ensuring secure mobile access and data protection.
  
Manage federated identity solutions using Azure Active Directory and Microsoft Identity Manager, ensuring secure and seamless access.
  
Package and deploy applications for MAC and other platforms, ensuring compatibility and performance.
  
Provide exceptional customer service, addressing technical issues and ensuring customer satisfaction.
  
  

**Required Skills:**  

Microsoft System Centre Suite 2016/2019
  
Configuration Manager – Current Branch
  
Operating System Deployments – Windows 10/Win11
  
MAC operating System - Sonoma, Sequoia,14. xx & 15.xx
  
Knowledge on jamf
  
Microsoft Intune Integration – MDM (Android, IOS, Windows) & PC Management
  
Operations Manager 2016
  
Microsoft Enterprise Mobility and Security Suite
  
Federated Identity (Azure Active Directory and Microsoft Identity Manager)
  
Microsoft Intune (Cloud & Hybrid Configurations)
  
Application Packaging – MAC, Int
  
Rights Management (Azure and On Premise)
  
Azure Multi-Factor Authentication
  
Strong technical background
  
Strong commitment to customer service
  
Strong proficiency in English and Swedish languages.
  
  

**What we Offer:**  

Annual Leaves per calendar year + Public Holidays
  
Personnel Medical Insurance & Occupational Group life insurance Coverage.
  
Additional pension coverage
  
Wellness Allowance
  
Extensive training and learning opportunities with internal and external partner-learning portals.
  
Travel (Apart from regular place of work) and other official expenses reimbursed on actuals as per policy.
  
Relocation assistance and expenses cover, if applicable & relocating to work location-city.
  
  

Diversity and Inclusion at Wipro
  
We are an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, marital status, age, ethnic and national origin, sexual and political orientation and disability status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
  
Öppen för alla
  
Vi fokuserar på din kompetens, inte dina övriga förutsättningar. Vi är öppna för att anpassa rollen eller arbetsplatsen efter dina behov.
company_description: Wipro Limited is a leading technology services and consulting firm focused on building innovative solutions that address clients’ most complex digital transformation needs.

title: Fota, filma och klipp! Skapa content som syns - Drömuppdrag hos Takteam
description:
Sommarjobb (eller höstjobb?) för dig som älskar kameror, kreativitet – och kanske lite AI
  
Vi letar efter dig som brinner för att fånga ögonblick. Någon som ser en snygg vinkel, hör ett ljudklipp som skulle funka perfekt i en reel, och som gärna klipper ihop något som verkligen känns – inte bara syns.
  
**På Takteam jobbar vi med takvård i alla former:** vi tvättar, behandlar, målar och hjälper husägare att ta hand om sina hem. Vi gör ett riktigt bra jobb – men vi är inte lika bra på att visa upp det. Det är där du kommer in.
  
Vi behöver en content creator som kan följa med ut till våra pågående jobb runt om i Kalmar län, dokumentera med kamera, drönare och actionkamera, och sen skapa innehåll som berättar vad vi faktiskt gör – på ett snyggt, trovärdigt och engagerande sätt.
  
Du kommer jobba nära vår marknadschef och få både stöttning och stor kreativ frihet att testa idéer. Det här är ett uppdrag i projektform under några månader till att börja med – men vi ser gärna att det leder till mer, om vi trivs med varandra.
  
Det passar perfekt för dig som pluggar media, film eller kommunikation, eller som redan jobbar frilans och vill ta dig an ett uppdrag med tydlig start – och öppning för fortsättning. Vi tror att det här jobbet passar dig som är nyfiken, självgående och gillar att skapa grejer som gör skillnad.
  
Vi är väldigt flexibla med både upplägg och arbetstider. Du kanske vill jobba 25%, eller köra på 50 eller 100% – det löser vi tillsammans. Du kanske vill filma ute en morgon, och redigera en kväll hemma – inga problem. Det viktigaste är att jobbet blir gjort och att du är engagerad i det du skapar.
  
  

**Vad du kommer göra:**  

* Följa med ut till våra uppdrag och dokumentera med film, foto och drönare
* Klippa ihop content till våra sociala medier, hemsida, YouTube och kampanjer
* Bygga upp ett strukturerat mediebibliotek med både råmaterial och färdiga klipp
* Arbeta tätt tillsammans med vår marknadschef, som du också rapporterar till


Hålla koll på vad som trendar och hjälpa oss ligga rätt i tiden med vår närvaro
  
  

**Vi har utrustningen – du står för berättandet:**  

Panasonic S5II med tillbehör
  
DJI Air 3S-drönare
  
Actionkamera
  
Adobe Creative Cloud (Premiere, Photoshop, Illustrator, Lightroom – och gärna After Effects, men inget måste)
  
  

**Vi tror att du är:**  

Kreativ, självgående och trygg med kamera i hand och klippning i fokus
  
  

Van att arbeta strukturerat och gillar frihet under ansvar
  
  

Intresserad av AI, visuellt berättande och hur man bygger content som engagerar
  
  

Någon som gärna fyller på din portfolio med riktiga case – och gillar tanken på att ditt material faktiskt kommer att användas och synas
  
Du måste ha körkort så att du kan ta dig mellan objekten!
  
  

**Omfattning & upplägg:**  

Projektform på 3 månader till att börja med
  
  

Vi är öppna för allt från 25% till heltid
  
  

Möjlighet till förlängning för rätt person
  
  

Flexibla arbetstider – du styr mycket själv så länge du levererar det vi kommit överens om
  
  

Du utgår från Kalmar eller närområdet, och är beredd att ta dig till våra kunduppdrag runt om i länet
  
  

**Så söker du:**  

1. Bifoga en kort presentation av dig själv
  
  

2. Bifoga länk till befintliga alster eller ännu hellre en portfolio – via länk (Du kan skicka t.ex. Instagram, YouTube eller saker som du producerat som ligger uppe digitalt så vi kan ta en titt) eller som Google Drive-mapp

title: Automation and AI Architect
description:
We are looking for an innovative and visionary Automation and AI Architect to help shape the future of intelligent solutions at Aleido. This is a role for someone who thrives on solving complex problems through thoughtful design and deep technical expertise - and wants to lead from the front in transforming how our business leverages automation and AI.
  
About the role
  
As an Automation and AI Architect, you’ll play a critical role in setting the direction for how we design, implement, and scale smart systems across the organization. You’ll be responsible for crafting the architectural blueprint for AI and automation initiatives, aligning cutting-edge technology with real business needs.
  
Define and own the architecture for automation and AI solutions across business units.
  
Guide the selection, integration, and orchestration of tools, frameworks, and platform - balancing innovation with maintainability and scalability.
  
Collaborate with stakeholders to translate strategic business goals into technical designs and long-term roadmaps.
  
Establish best practices and governance around the development and deployment of AI/automation solutions.
  
Lead technical reviews, mentor engineers, and contribute to fostering a strong engineering and innovation culture.
  
Stay ahead of the curve with emerging trends in AI, automation, and software architecture - and apply that insight to continuously evolve our capabilities.
  
  

Who you are
  
  

**We believe that you have:**  

Proven experience designing and implementing enterprise-level automation and AI architectures.
  
Deep understanding of scripting languages (e.g. Python, PowerShell), orchestration tools, and modern AI/ML platforms.
  
Strong analytical and systems-thinking mindset, especially for breaking down complexity into elegant, scalable solutions.
  
Excellent stakeholder management and communication skills - you can speak the language of both business and technology.
  
A proactive, forward-thinking approach to problem solving and continuous improvement.
  
  

**Nice to have:**  

Experience with Azure cloud services and AI offerings.
  
Familiarity with tools like OpenAI, Azure Cognitive Services, or other LLM providers.
  
Knowledge of business process analysis, RPA, or systems integration.
  
  

Who we are
  
Aleido is a Swedish international company with a long heritage of driving the development of aftermarket information and learning solutions. Our customers develop complex products or systems, or seek knowledge and confidence to create lasting change, within a wide range of industries including automotive, telecom, advanced machinery, rail and medtech. We are almost a thousand colleagues in five countries. Together we bridge the gap between technology and the people who depend on it – by making the advanced simply understood.
  
You’ll be joining a passionate, forward-thinking team that’s actively shaping the future of AI and automation at Aleido. If you’re excited about designing impactful solutions and influencing strategic tech direction, we’d love to hear from you.
company_description: Our mission is to bridge the gap between technology and people by making the advanced simply understood.

title: Automation and AI Engineer
description:
We are looking for a flexible and forward-thinking Automation and AI Engineer to join our core automation team. This is a unique opportunity to work on cutting-edge projects that leverage the latest in artificial intelligence, data science, and automation scripting to drive real business value.
  
About the role
  
In this role, you'll support teams across the business with smart, scalable, and impactful solutions. You’ll work in a fast-paced, creative environment where curiosity, adaptability, and collaboration are key.
  
Design, build, and maintain automation and AI-driven solutions that enhance operational efficiency.
  
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify automation opportunities and translate business needs into technical solutions.
  
Evaluate and integrate third-party tools where applicable, balancing custom development with strategic use of external technologies.
  
Ensure all solutions are aligned with business goals and deliver measurable value through clear KPIs.
  
Continuously explore new technologies and industry trends to keep our solutions ahead of the curve.
  
Contribute to a knowledge-sharing culture, participating in peer reviews and cross-team learning.
  
  

**Who you are We belive that you have:**  

A strong foundation in automation tools, scripting languages (e.g. Python, PowerShell), and AI frameworks or platforms.
  
Experience working with data and analytical tools to inform decisions and drive improvements.
  
Creative problem-solving mindset with a strong sense of ownership and accountability.
  
Excellent communication and teamwork skills — you enjoy working with others in a dynamic, fast-evolving environment.
  
Ability to prioritize and balance multiple initiatives with a focus on impact and value delivery.
  
  

Nice to Have
  
Experience with Azure cloud platform.
  
Exposure AI services (e.g., OpenAI, Azure Cognitive Services).
  
Understanding of business process mapping and optimization techniques.
  
  

Who we are
  
Aleido is a Swedish international company with a long heritage of driving the development of aftermarket information and learning solutions. Our customers develop complex products or systems, or seek knowledge and confidence to create lasting change, within a wide range of industries including automotive, telecom, advanced machinery, rail and medtech. We are almost a thousand colleagues in five countries. Together we bridge the gap between technology and the people who depend on it – by making the advanced simply understood.
  
You’ll be part of a tight-knit and innovative team where your work truly makes a difference. We believe in empowering people, embracing creativity, and constantly pushing the boundaries of what’s possible with automation and AI.

title: Regional Manager - Hybrid Cloud
company_industry: Computer and Network Security and Higher Education
description:
Join TCS Cloud Services: Leading the Digital Transformation
 



  





 Be at the Cutting Edge of Innovation
 



  





**Tata Consultancy Services (TCS)** 
 Cloud Services is at the forefront of digital transformation, reshaping how businesses operate in today's fast-paced digital era. Being part of this team, you will be part of a global network of experts who leverage local insights and global best practices to deliver innovative AI-infused hybrid cloud solutions.
 



  





 We pride ourselves on our advisory-led sales approach, deeply engaging with clients to tailor solutions that not only meet their current needs but also future-proof their growth. Our commitment to innovation allows us to develop cutting-edge products and platforms, driving transformative changes in business operations, collaboration, and scalability.
 



  





 The hybrid multi-cloud landscape offers immense growth potential in the increasingly digital world. Our diverse customer base across multiple industries and geographies is a testament to our ability to adapt and deliver customized solutions that align with client business objectives. By integrating AI-driven platforms and methodologies into our services, we optimize cloud environments and enhance operational efficiency.
 



  





 At TCS, we embrace a culture of continuous improvement and agile responsiveness. We are not merely adapting to market dynamics; we are actively shaping them. Our vision extends beyond singular solutions to a holistic ecosystem that empowers businesses with the latest technologies, enabling them to innovate faster, scale more efficiently, and stay competitive in a rapidly changing market.
 



  





 Join us at TCS Cloud Services and be a part of a team committed to excellence and a future-focused mindset. Together, we will lead businesses into a thriving digital future.'
 



  





**Job title:** 
 Regional Manager - Hybrid Cloud
 



**Location:** 
 Stockholm, Sweden
 



**Language requirement:** 
 Swedish & English
 



**Experience range:** 
 15 to 20 years
 



**Educational Qualifications:** 
 MBA or equivalent advanced degree in finance, business, technology, or a related field.
 



  





**Key responsibilities:** 




  





 1. Finalize and Sign-Off Program Objectives for the Region:
 


* Detail out regional program objectives - pre- Sales, Solution, Delivery, Talent, Governance
* Regional Pipeline, TCV, Revenue Growth and Business Outcomes as per time horizons



  





 2. Own / drive Region specific TCV, pipeline growth Targets, targeted Revenue and Margin Growth and Business Outcomes:
 


* Monitor and report on key performance metrics, ensuring accountability and continuous improvement.



  





 3. Joint Go-to-Market Strategies:
 


* Collaborate with BGs, Geo Sales to Identify Regional and global accounts in the region and prepare Account specific GTM strategies and plan.
* Drive Region specific GTM strategies in collaboration with BG Accounts and Geo Sales teams
* Collaborate with Regional partners and regional leaders of Global partners to develop and execute Big Bets specific joint go-to-market strategies in alignments with overall GTM strategies.
* Leverage partner ecosystems in the region to expand TCS’s reach and position Big Bets to clients.



  





 4. Stakeholder Management:
 


* Build and maintain strong relationships with BG/ISU/Account/Partner Account leaders in the region
* Work closely with TCS Cloud internal stakeholders, including GTM, Advisory, CoE, delivery, Alliance, and support teams, to ensure alignment and execution of Big Bets goals.



  





 5. Support CoE to prepare offerings / platforms suitable to the regional customer needs aligned to the big bet / Drive the adoption and usage of CoE offerings and platforms in the field / delivery engagements
 



  





 6. Innovation and Thought Leadership:
 


* Provide input on emerging trends and technologies
* Publish articles, blogs, POV's aligned to the big bets and market / tech movements



  





 7. Governance Model
 


* Detailed Governance structure, RACI to drive the Big Bets in. the region
* Roles, Responsibilities and KPIs for the region



  





 KPIs
 


* Annual Regional TCV from Big Bet / Regional Pipeline value generated through Big Bet
* Regional Market share growth in Big Bet / Regional Revenue and Margin delivered by Big Bets
* Regional Client satisfaction and retention rates for Big Bets



  





**Mandatory Skill set:** 




  





 1. Strategic Leadership:
 


* Proven experience in sales leadership for an industry vertical/sub-vertical or managing large, global Program or Large Accounts
* Proven track record in large scale cloud transformation programs
* Demonstrated ability to develop and maintain good client relationships



  





 2. Business Development, Revenue Growth:
 


* Track record of driving significant sales Pipeline, TCV and revenue growth
* Experience in negotiating and managing large, complex deals



  





 3. Technical Expertise:
 


* Good understanding of cloud and digital technologies, cloud architecture, digital transformation trends, multi cloud, hybrid cloud environments, cloud native tech
* Proficiency in Business value focused solutioning involving domain and technology knowledge



  





 4. Stakeholder Management:
 


* Strong relationship-building skills with C-level executives at client organizations.
* Ability to collaborate effectively with internal stakeholders (GTM, CoE, Partner, Delivery, support teams).



  





 5. Leadership and Influence:
 


* Experience leading cross-functional teams in a matrix organization.
* Ability to influence and align internal and external stakeholders toward common goals.



  





 6. Communication and Presentation Skills:
 


* Exceptional verbal and written communication skills.
* Ability to represent TCS at executive meetings



  





**Desirable skill set:** 




  





 1. Advanced Technical Knowledge:
 


* Certifications in cloud technologies
* Familiarity with digital technologies like AI, IoT, Security, and other technologies (e.g. Mainframe or Enterprise Applications)
* Familiarity with microservices architecture, containerization, cloud security



  





 2. Regional Market Understanding:
 


* Experience working in geographic regions and understanding diverse market dynamics.
* Knowledge of regulatory and compliance requirements in regional markets.



  





 3. Innovation and Co-Development:
 


* Experience driving co-innovation initiatives to develop cutting-edge solutions.
* Familiarity with agile methodologies and design thinking.



  





 4. Financial Acumen:
 


* Advanced financial modeling and business case development skills.
* Experience managing P&L for business units.



  





 5. Cultural Adaptability:
 


* Experience working in multicultural environments and managing diverse teams.
* Ability to adapt to different organizational cultures and working styles.



  





 6. Thought Leadership:
 


* Published articles, whitepapers, or speaking engagements at industry forums.
